name: Ruin Valley Demo
description:
♥ If you like the demo, consider donating. I'm just a solo dev, so every bit helps! ♥

Welcome to Ruin Valley!

Ruin Valley is a metroidvania game with tight controls and retro-looking graphics.

This is only a demo about 20 minutes in length. The game is still being worken on and is in an early stage of development. Some things might change.

Please, leave your feedback in the comments. Let's play and walkthrough videos are also appreciated! If you encounter a bug, feel free to also leave a comment or to PM me on Twitter.

FAQ

  • What's the planned release date?

Mid to late 2022.

  • On what platforms?

For now, I'm only considering PC (itch.io\Steam). Would love to port the game on consoles, but can't promise anything right now.
